name: Love Apocalypse
description:
You are a normal high school junior at End of Worlds High School, except…

You’re the apocalypse! 

An abomination that gives children nightmares!

A horrifying creature of the night harkening the end of times!

A disgusting amalgamation of the darkest ideas known to man!

But first and foremost…

You’re a teenager! And before you bring about the destruction of the known world, you want to find love.

For a while now, you’ve been talking with 4 other classmates…

This is the DEMO of Love Apocalypse. You will only be able to pursue 2 characters. Updates to come : )
